mapper.sql: publish_id, belong_to, publisher, charge_by, start_time, endTime, apply_end_time, signup_number, plan_number, qq_group, note, status
mapper.select:
SELECT publish_id as publishId,name as name,category,belong_to as belongto,charge_by as chargeby,start_time as starttime,endTime as endtime, apply_end_time as applyendtime,signup_number as signupnumber,va.plan_number as plannumber,qq_group as qqgroup, published_activity.note as note,publisher,`require`,site,duration,description,activity_id as activityId,status from published_activity left join volunteer_activity va on va.activity_id = published_activity.belong_to where status > -1
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and category like concat('%',#{category},'%')
and start_time >= #{startTime}
and endTime <= #{endTime}
and apply_end_time < NOW()
and publish_id not in (SELECT apply_for from activity_apply where apply_by = #{userId})
mapper.update: update published_activity set signup_number = signup_number + 1 where publish_id = #{id}
